root.name: Colin McRae Rally 2005
root.description: The N gage version of Colin Mcrae rally 2005 was actually a port of Colin Mcrae 2.0 from the Playstation. It included online play where each stage could be contested to complete in the fastest time monthly medals were awarded to the best drivers.
